slug: Watch An Exclusive Gary Player Putting Tip From 'A Game For Life'
body: In this clip from his new DVD, "A Game For Life," nine-time major winner Gary Player gives a brief history of putting approaches, tells you what every great putter agrees on and provides a practical drill to put it into action.
